title: High Noon Yasuo
body:
I wanted to buy high noon yasuo, but do not have sufficient rp.
He was on sale.
Riot, can you please give me some rp so I can buy him?

Hope you can help,
Thanks

replies.body: We like to help when we can, and while we have sales we haven't really gifted out RP.  We might be able to work something out, though.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll look individually with you.  We'll get back to you asap.
